item.description:
Inquisitive Minds is super sizing one of our regular events and taking it to sea. 

Games & Blind Date Stories

Here is your chance to join your fellow Inquisitives in a mega IM event. We'll be taking the ferry from Boston to Provincetown. Along the way we'll combine a game night (only this time  in the morning) and a fun IM discussion topic.

 

On the ferry ride in the morning we'll play games, drink coffee , chat, and enjoy the ride!

 

Once in Provincetown, we'll explore the town, the shops and get a bite to eat. And maybe an adult beverage!

 

On the ride back, we'll revisit a past light hearted IM discussion on best and worst blind date experiences.  What is the funniest dating experience you have had?  What is the most memorable? The most romantic?   What is the hands down worst?   We had a blast with this topic the last time we did it.

 

Come hang out with old friends, and make some new friends!

 

What to bring: your favorite game (Apples to Apples, Taboo, Scrabble, card games, etc.), sunblock, etc.

Details: We'll catch the Provincetown II, Saturday morning at 9AM.

Arrive in Ptown at noon.

The return ferry departs for Boston at 3:30PM.

Round trip fare on the "slow" ferry is $44.  If you swim one way, the fare drops to $22.

Be sure to arrive early so you don't miss the boat!

You can buy ferry tickets online:  http://www.baystatecruisecompany.com/schedule.html

Where: 75 Seaport Blvd, Boston MA Directions to the pier at the World Trade Center on Seaport Blvd: http://www.baystatecruisecompany.com/directions.html

 

If you can bring a game, please mention it in your comment when you RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at the pier where you board the ferry! Be sure to get there early!
item.name: Provincetown day trip: Otters, Tigers and Bears, oh my!
